name: LAST <> STEP
description:
Please check levels 8 and 12 with new mechanics to get better understanding with my game. those explore a lot about jam theme. thanks for choosing to play my game.

The game is made by me for Brackeys GameJam 2020.2 in 7 days.

#brackeys #solodev #secondgame

DISCLAIMER:

All levels are unlocked for you to play the game at its full pace.

don't miss levels after tutorials [T] (They have something special in store)you will definetly enjoy the game

Kindly play the tutorial for better experience

Theme: Rewind.

It is a Puzzle game where, you play as a blue robot who need to reach the portal crossing all the obstacles. you use your rewinded clone who walks in your footsteps to reach the goal.

BASIC CONTROLS: KEYS ACTION ArrowsPlayer movement
RRewind clone to last positionFforward clone to next position QUICK OVERVIEW: 

as you complete level new elements are introduced and the levels become and each new element have a tutorial before it arrives so if you quickly want to know you can play tutorials and the following levels.
